text: When Lincoln Paid is a 1913 American drama movie directed by Francis Ford (who also stars) and starring Jack Conway, Ethel Grandin, Charles Edler. It was distributed by Mutual Film. ==Other websites== * Category:1913 movies Category:1910s war movies Category:1910s drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by Francis Ford Category:Movies set in the 1860s
title: When Lincoln Paid
